query.statement:
SELECT PJT, HNO, CASE WHEN SNM = 'SD' THEN '' ELSE SNM END SNM, BJD, HDM, UPD, NAP, ZSITE_NM, ADDR1 || ' ' || ADDR2 || '(' || ZSITE_TEL || ')' AS ADDR, (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 WHERE MANDT=C.MANDT AND TEMNO=C.TEMNO AND RETIF = '') NAMET, (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT=C.MANDT AND LIFNR=C.LIFNR) NAME1, ZSPEC1, CAST(ZSPEC7 AS INTEGER) AS ZSPEC7, CAST(ZSPEC11 AS INTEGER) AS ZSPEC11, RADIO_1, RADIO_2, REQ, A.FRAME_CK ,(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL001 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = C.MANDT AND X.GBN = 'E' AND X.PSPID = C.POSID AND X.POSID = C.POSID_1) > 0 THEN '파일첨부' ELSE '' END ) AS FILE , (SELECT VALUE(X.VALUE, '') FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = C.MANDT AND X.HOGI = C.POSID_1 AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_EHM' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC fetch first 1 rows only ) AS VALUE -- 재질
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST11071M AS A ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C
WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PJT = B.POSID AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PJT = C.POSID AND A.HNO = RIGHT(C.POSID_1,3) AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = #PJT# AND A.HNO = #HNO#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
